text:
Ben Chijioke (17 August 1972 – 7 May 2020), better known by his stage name Ty, was a British rapper. He released the albums "Awkward" (2001), "Upwards" (2004), "Closer" (2006), "Special Kind of Fool" (2010)
and "A Work of Heart" (2018). He was born in London.
In April 2020, Ty was hospitalized in London for COVID-19. He died on 7 May 2020 from pneumonia caused by the infection, aged 47.
